ygData.subject: RE: Clarity
ygData.msgSnippet: Just for the fun of it, has anyone tried a 5 bard, 1 wizard party (all the bards singing clarity)?  It would be interesting to see just how much mana the wiz
ygData.messageBody:
Just for the fun of it, has anyone tried a 5 bard, 1 wizard party (all the
bards singing clarity)? It would be interesting to see just how much mana
the wiz could cruise through.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 32 Bard [Povar]

> -----Original Message-----
> From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, November 16, 1999 2:26 PM
> To: Eqbards@...
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Clarity
>
>
> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Tue, 16 Nov 1999, JasonF wrote:
> >
> > Being a newly 32nd bard I'm getting hit with various
> questions and claims
> > regarding my 32nd level Clarity song. I have read
> previously on this list
> > that our song does stack with an Enchanter's Clarity spell.
> Does anyone
> > have hard number with what percentage increase there is?
> Is it in fact
>
> L29 enchanter Clarity was about a 30% reduction in med
> time. L32 bard Clarity was about a 33% reduction in med
> time. L40 bard Clarity was about a 38% reduction in med
> time. These figures are probably +/- 3% or so due to
> inaccuracies in eyeballing the mana bar, but it really seems
> like a straight level% conversion.
>
> I have yet to time the spells/songs stacking, but I have yet
> to see any anecdotal claims that they *don't* stack. All the
> anecdotes I've seen people give say one enchanter Clarity plus
> as many bard clarities as you like will all stack.
>
> --
